products.title: Splash Tropez Grey Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash tropez is an elegant grey/brown hue, with its rich earthy tones it will compliment a vast range of interior colour palettes. The perfect fit roller blind is an effective, no hassle way to fit a blind to any window. The blind comes in a slimline frame and clips directly onto the window, which means no drilling. The framework is also available in 4 different colour options to compliment any room.

products.title: Splash Silver Mist Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Silver mist is a soft mid grey shade, a chic addition to modern interiors. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this bold red perfect fit blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.
